CAREER SUMMARY
Oct 2016 to date Ecolab India, Middle East & Africa
Ecolab, a Fortune 500 company, is the global leader in water, hygiene and energy technologies and services. Around the world businesses in foodservice, food processing, hospitality, healthcare, industrial, and oil and gas markets choose Ecolab products and services to keep their environment clean and safe, operate efficiently and achieve sustainability goals.
Oct 2016 to date

Oversee the Talent Acquisition Center of Excellence (CoE) and the implementation of  CANDIDATE 		Yassin Fateh-Sound

CAREER SUMMARY
Oct 2016 to date Ecolab India, Middle East & Africa
Ecolab, a Fortune 500 company, is the global leader in water, hygiene and energy technologies and services. Around the world businesses in foodservice, food processing, hospitality, healthcare, industrial, and oil and gas markets choose Ecolab products and services to keep their environment clean and safe, operate efficiently and achieve sustainability goals.
Oct 2016 to date
Position: IMEA Talent Acquisition Head
Oversee the Talent Acquisition Center of Excellence (CoE) and the implementation of Talent Acquisition process improvements to hire top talent
Responsible to create and deploy Regional talent acquisition strategies to strengthen the organization's capabilities
Designed and facilitated Behavioral-Based Interview Trainings for managers across MEA
Implemented the Ecolab Employer Brand Promise across the region
Responsible to hire executive roles across Middle East & Africa
Implemented Workday Recruiting Applicant Tracking System across the region
Winner of the Q4 2016 MENA Bravo Excellence Awards for Culture
Nov 2019 to date
Position: IMEA HR Business Partner (dual role)
Provide HR guidance on strategic initiatives for the Energy Downstream business
Execute talent reviews and succession planning
Lead Sales compensation plans and organization structure work aligned to the needs for the global models and expectations
Review employee research and engagement results and conduct action planning
Conduct Workforce Planning and Training Needs Analysis
Advise senior business leaders and managers on serious employee relations issues and manage risk effectively
Establish key communication and change strategies for business events impacting people
HR Development:
Lead the design and implementation of HR Policies across the region
Developed and rolled-out an Onboarding Framework globally
Feb 2017 - Sep 2017
Position: Acting HR Head, Sub-Saharan Africa
HR Operations:
Led all HR functions for Ecolab Sub-Saharan Africa including recruitment, employee relations, compensation, organizational development, talent and change management
Identified and implemented opportunities for improvement in HR service delivery
Managed employee relations and disciplinary hearings activities
Led key compensation and benefits processes including annual merit planning and performance reviews
Received a 2017 Spot Award for the excellent contribution and support provided to the Sub-Saharan Africa HR team
Dec 2010 to Jun 2016 Cleveland Clinic Abu Dhabi
Cleveland Clinic Abu Dhabi is an initiative of Mubadala, a leading Investment & Development Company in Abu Dhabi, and Cleveland Clinic, one of the top 4 Hospitals in USA. Cleveland Clinic Abu Dhabi has been considered as the largest and most complex healthcare project in the world and the biggest global recruitment effort in healthcare with hiring occurring in over 65 countries.
Jun 2015 to Jan 2016 Acting Talent Acquisition Director
2014 to Jun 2015 Talent Acquisition Manager
2014 -2014 Talent Acquisition Team Lead
Dec 2010 to Dec 2012 Recruiter
Strategy:
Designed and implemented innovative & integrated talent acquisition strategies and plans
Developed talent acquisition processes & policies
Delivered a strategic framework for sharing and implementing talent acquisition best practices
Created and optimized talent acquisition tools, templates and analytics
Winner of the 2014 Operational Excellence Award from the Mubadala Human Capital Summit
Recruitment:
Led and trained a team of 10 recruitment experts responsible to hire +1,200 roles
Set-up and optimized the talent acquisition function and infrastructure from scratch
Planned & managed the Talent Acquisition & International Mobility budget of AED 11,000,000
Created and rolled-out a digital Talent Attraction Strategy & Candidate Value Proposition
Improved CCAD Employer Brand Index: ranked 26th in the MENA Top 100 Most In-Demand Employers in 2015 by LinkedIn
Reduced time-to-fill by 20% & cost-per-hire by 35% through strategic planning & sourcing
Winner of the 2013 Cleveland Clinic Abu Dhabi 1st Annual Employee Excellence Award
International Mobility:
Led a team of 4 mobility experts responsible to onboard +2,000 employees and their families
Contributed in the development of International Mobility (relocation, onboarding, repatriation)
Created a guide “How to find a job in Abu Dhabi” added as part of the onboarding guide
Winner of the 2015 Best New Hire Onboarding Program Award (Gold category) from the Brandon Hall Group
Workforce Planning:
Served as Talent Acquisition Business Partner and internal consultant to business leaders
Designed and implemented workforce management tools to optimize resource planning & management (including staffing changes, dashboard, scorecard, reports)
Supported workforce optimization and people transformations: organizational design, restructuring, financial cost analysis, skills assessment and capability building
HR Development:
Designed an employee referral program & a comprehensive Applicant Tracking System RFP
Planned and implemented continuous / process improvement plans and initiatives
Set-up and managed assessment centers and tests for mass-hiring positions
Aug 2009 to Nov 2010 Total
Position: Recruitment Officer
Total is the world’s fourth-largest oil and gas company and second-largest solar energy operator with
SunPower.
Recruitment:
Managed the end-to-end recruitment plan and process including the recruitment agencies
Designed & rolled-out recruitment ads and campaigns through social media
Developed and implemented the affiliate recruitment policies & procedures
Emiratization:
Developed communication tools to increase and speed-up the recruitment of UAE Nationals
Optimized the “Tatweer” program, the UAE Nationals Integration & Development program
Campus Management:
Selected and hired interns as part of the “Tebab” program
Organized and participated to career fairs in the local universities
Prepared monthly payroll and financial memos for interns
HR Development:
Developed the Workforce planning to include Emiratization target, succession & career paths
Produced monthly reports such as employment studies
Realized an internal HR video “Future of our Energy: Our people” to promote Total’s brand
Jan 2007 to Mar 2009 Accenture, Paris
Position: Consulting Analyst
HR Development: Accenture Head Office (3 months)
Led Accenture Campus Recruiting and Outreach efforts for analyst roles
Optimized the recruitment workflows
Designed analyst career paths and individual development plans
Developed the employee performance management system & referral program
ERP Implementation: Louis Vuitton Moët Hennessy - LVMH (World Leader in Luxury) (1 year)
Developed functional specifications for a new payroll system - From SAP Zadig to
SAP HR
Participated in the implementation & deployment of the new payroll system
Designed and provided trainings and support to end users
Process Optimization: GDF Suez (French Leading Natural Gas Provider) (1 year)
Created operational reporting tools for the management of employees’ contracts
Defined adequate change management strategy and tools
Participated in the resource specification and allocation of the project
COMMENT
Human Capital leader with sound business skills and over 14 years of experience in HR, talent acquisition, workforce planning, talent management & HR consulting in complex & large global companies. Areas of expertise include:
Strategic Talent Acquisition
Applicant Tracking
Job Analysis / Evaluation
Organizational Design
HR Business Partnering
Talent Analytics Reporting
Contract Management
Labor Law & Compliance
Assessment & Testing
Social Media Recruitment
HR Strategic Planning
Talent Development
Vendor Management
Project Management
Talent Management
Workforce Planning
Certification
Global Professional in Human Resources (GPHR): HR Certification Institute (Dec 2012)
Strategic Workforce Planning Certification (SWP) HCI (May 2018)
Training
Hogan Assessments: Mentis Group, Abu Dhabi, UAE
Towers Watson Job Evaluation & Grading: Towers Watson Group, Abu Dhabi, UAE
Building Managerial Capability: Cleveland Clinic Group, Ohio, USA
Leadership Foundation Series Ecolab, Dubai, UAE
IT Skills
Workday, SAP, Oracle, Lawson / Infor, Microsoft Office, Lotus Notes, HRDSoft, Smart Draw,
OrgPlus 3.0
For further information please contact Jan Johnston on 01695 570 696 or email janj@johnston-vere.co.uk
